attributes.action: please forgive the American people for the way you were treated during your recent visit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We average Americans want to express our apologies for the questionable behavior of our President regarding your recent visit to the United States. It goes without saying that his reception for you was unacceptable to many of us.

Please rest assured that more than just a few Americans grasp the pivotal, dignified, and guiding role that the British people and government have played in the maturation and survival of our American Republic in particular and Western Civilization in general.

Most Americans wish the very best to The Rt Hon Gordon Brown MP, his family, and all our good friends throughout the United Kingdom.

In embarrassment, but with best wishes for a continued strong relationship between our countries!

rejection.details: You can find information on how to write to the Prime Minister here: http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
